angle.straight_on: camera facing directly forward, eye-level symmetry
angle.slightly_above: camera angled slightly from above, flattering light
angle.slightly_below: viewed subtly from below, strong presence
angle.tilted_head: head slightly tilted toward camera, intimate framing
angle.mirror_reflection: viewed through mirror reflection, frame visible
angle.cheek_angle: angled from one cheek, soft perspective
angle.through_object: seen through glass or fabric, light distortion
angle.off_axis_gaze: looking past the camera, not directly at viewer

pose.resting_chin: resting chin on hand, calm expression
pose.crossed_arms: arms crossed lightly, relaxed and confident
pose.hair_touching: touching her hair gently, slightly dreamy pose
pose.sideways_glance: body turned, head looking over shoulder
pose.hands_clasped: hands clasped in front, formal yet soft pose
pose.reaching_forward: hand reaching toward the camera softly
pose.hand_near_face: fingers near lips or cheek, subtle flirtation
pose.over_shoulder_smile: slight smile while looking back over shoulder
pose.covering_mouth: covering mouth slightly in surprise or playfulness
pose.arms_behind_back: arms gently behind back, posture upright
pose.holding_flower: holding a delicate flower near face
pose.eyes_closed: eyes softly closed, calm or dreamlike atmosphere

composition.offset_balance: face positioned off-center with balanced lighting
composition.framed_with_light: light shapes framing the face from side or back
composition.soft_depth: background blurred to focus sharply on eyes
composition.foreground_blur: blurred object partially in foreground, framing face

focus.eye_highlight: sparkle and sharp detail in eyes
focus.soft_lens_glow: soft glow around subject with light bloom
focus.subtle_bokeh: gentle bokeh in background, soft tones
focus.shadow_detail: face half in soft shadow, delicate contrast
focus.silk_texture: emphasis on skin texture like silk, gentle lighting
focus.backlight_glow: light source behind creating glow around hair

distance.close_up: tight face crop, expressive eyes, detailed makeup
distance.upper_body: shoulders and head visible, soft lighting
distance.portrait: upper half body, elegant posture, cinematic feel
